title: Gogglebox star Yvie Jones gives up on looking for love on dating apps
text:
Her former Gogglebox co-star Angie Kent is currently looking for love on The Bachelorette.

And on Sunday, Channel 10 reality TV star Yvie Jones, 46, revealed she has given up on trying to find love on dating apps and admitted she would rather find her perfect match the old fashioned way.

'No,I don't do dating apps,' she told Sydney Confidential on Sunday.

'I'm just not made for it': Gogglebox star Yvie Jones (pictured) revealed on Sunday that she's given up on looking for love on dating apps

'I'm just not made for dating apps, there's too much navigation to it and I like to see someone and look straight into their eyes and immediately know whether there's a connection or not,' she told the publication.

The TV star went on to say she has been 'been fat-shamed and attacked about her weight by men' and has felt 'let down' by online dating.

The blonde's admission comes after her appearance on The Bachelorette, where she was reunited with her best pal, Angie Kent, to help her pick her perfect match.

Not for her! 'I'm just not made for dating apps, there's too much navigation to it and I like to see someone and look straight into their eyes and immediately know whether there's a connection or not,' she told the publication. Pictured with Gogglebox co-star Angie Kent

Difficult: The TV star went on to say she has been 'been fat-shamed and attacked about her weight by men' and has felt 'let down' by online dating. Pictured on The Project

During Thursday night's episode of The Bachelorette, the duo was reunited as they savagely reviewed her potential suitors.

The pals were hysterical as they discussed the gentlemen vying for Angie's heart - with Yvie even asking: 'Do you think you can go out with a guy with a made-up name like Carlin [Sterritt]?'

'Don't be a mole!' Angie laughed in retaliation, before saying: 'Don't! I'm going to wee my pants!'

Who do you love? The blonde's admission comes after her appearance on The Bachelorette, where she was reunited with her best pal, Angie Kent, to help her pick her perfect match

Hysterical: Angie (pictured) couldn't help but burst out laughing as she branded her best pal a 'mole' for mocking contestant Carlin's name

Yvie also revealed her favourite contestant was 'dog whisperer' Ryan Anderson, saying: 'On paper a really great guy. Like, he's got all that you want.'

'Well, I haven't spent a lot of time with him,' Angie replied.

Angie and Yvie rose to fame after they appeared on the first eight seasons of Gogglebox Australia together.
description: Her former Gogglebox co-star Angie Kent is currently looking for love on The Bachelorette.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
